mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jubilate Deo = in B flat, with duet for soprano and alto, and bass solo / arranged from the works of Giorza and Poniatowski by Charles Balmer
Oh! be joyful in the Lord
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Balmer, Charles, 1817-1892
Giorza, Paolo, 1832-1914
Poniatowski, Józef Antoni książę, 1763-1813
Robert, P. G. Rev
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For soloists (SAB), SATB chorus and piano or organ.
At head of title: "Devotedly inscribed to Rev. P. G. Robert, rector of the Holy Communion P.E. Church, Saint Louis."
Advertisement on p. [12]: "Beauties of oratorio, solos suitable for church or concert room."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Choruses, Sacred (Mixed voices, 4 parts) with piano
Choruses, Sacred (Mixed voices, 4 parts) with organ
Psalms (Music)--66th Psalm.
